Title: NETMESSAGE:... but something happened ...
Translation: 然而，如果不出意外的话应该是出意外了

Title: NETMESSAGE:It was a good job, without incidents to manage...
Translation: 只要不出意外，这就是一份不错的工作

Title: NETMESSAGE:We are a mercenary team hired to assume the security in this complex
Translation: 你们是承担此处安保任务的雇佣兵小队

Title: NETMESSAGE:The NP Corporation is a gigantic corporation which lead to dominate the bio-technology business
Translation: NP公司是一家专注于引领生物科技产业前进的大型企业

Title: NETMESSAGE:Welcome to the NP Corporation Research Facility
Translation: 欢迎来到NP公司研究设施

Title: NETMESSAGE:We need something...
Translation: 需要用一些东西铺路才能通过这里...

Title: NETMESSAGE:You found some planks !
Translation: 你找到了一些木制板条！

Title:
NETMESSAGE:What happened here ?

We have to find a way to access the labs
and contact the security team over there !
Translation:
发生甚么事了？

我们得想办法进入实验室
联系那儿的安保团队！

Title: NETMESSAGE:Nicolas (ReX) Poncin
Translation: 尼古拉斯 ・ （雷克斯） ・ 庞辛

Title: NETMESSAGE:Benoit (D.G.F.) Hanikenne
